I think we should deprecate [Joint::SetMaxForce](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e13cd41014071569f5d2d46284083365d6878ae5/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh?at=default#cl-325) and [Joint::GetMaxForce](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e13cd41014071569f5d2d46284083365d6878ae5/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh?at=default#cl-335), recommend user to use [SetAttribute for "fmax"](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e13cd41014071569f5d2d46284083365d6878ae5/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint.cc?at=default#cl-606) in ODE.

and add a new API `Joint::SetEffortLimit` similar to its counterpart [Joint::GetEffortLimit](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e13cd41014071569f5d2d46284083365d6878ae5/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh?at=default#cl-246) to accomplish effort (torque/force) limiting in joints.
content.html:
I think we should deprecate Joint::SetMaxForce and Joint::GetMaxForce, recommend user to use SetAttribute for "fmax" in ODE.

and add a new API Joint::SetEffortLimit similar to its counterpart Joint::GetEffortLimit to accomplish effort (torque/force) limiting in joints.
